sentences.en: As well as sprouting a few grey hairs, Kevin seems to be suffering the occasional memory loss.
sentences.cn: 除长出了些许白发外，凯文似乎还患上了间歇性失忆。

sentences.en: Don't mention failure when Kevin is around. He doesn't know the meaning of the word.
sentences.cn: 凯文在的时候不要提“失败”这个词。他不知道什么叫“失败”。

sentences.en: He will now fight Kevin Ford on the five-bout card.
sentences.cn: 他将在五局制比赛中迎战凯文·福特。

sentences.en: I don't like Kevin — he's got a nasty vindictive streak in him.
sentences.cn: 我不喜欢凯文——他报复心太重,叫人讨厌.

sentences.en: I think we should go round and tell Kevin to turn his music down.
sentences.cn: 我觉得我们应该去凯文家让他把音乐的声音调小一些。

sentences.en: I'm Kevin McDonald, and I'm a journalist.
sentences.cn: 我是凯文?麦克唐纳, 我是一名新闻记者.

sentences.en: In the final seconds, Gunn goalie Kevin Cantwell blocked two shots.
sentences.cn: 在最后的几秒钟，甘恩队的守门员凯文·坎特维尔扑出了两次射门。

sentences.en: Kevin arrived right on cue to care for Harry.
sentences.cn: 凯文到的正是时候，可以照顾哈丽。
凯文买了一瓶根汁汽水。

sentences.en: Kevin had treatment on the understanding that he would attempt to overcome his drinking problem.
sentences.cn: 凯文接受了治疗，但条件是他要努力克服自身的酗酒问题。

sentences.en: Kevin stopped to buy the evening paper from a news vendor.
sentences.cn: 凯文停下来向报贩买了一份晚报.

sentences.en: Kevin wandered in to see me this morning.
sentences.cn: 克文今天早晨顺便来看我.

sentences.en: Kevin wanted a lick of Sarah's lollipop.
sentences.cn: 凯文想舔一下萨拉的棒棒糖.

sentences.en: Kevin was always level-headed with both feet on the ground.
sentences.cn: 凯文总是头脑冷静，脚踏实地。

sentences.en: There's a call for you, Mr. Kevin.
sentences.cn: 凯文先生, 有你的电话.

phrases.tran_cn: 凯文·科斯特纳（美国电影演员，导演及制片人）
凯文·约翰逊（前微软Windows业务主管）；凯文强生（NBA知名控球后卫之一）
